definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Ex 10:21 darkness, obscurity;—abs. [[חשֶׁךְ]] Ge 1:2 + 75 t. (+ Ez Eze 8:12 del. Co A B etc.); cstr. id. Ex 10:22; sf. [[חָשְׁכִּי]] Ps 18:29 = 2Sa 22:29; —

darkness (opp. [[אוֹר]]) lit. Ge 1:2, Ge 1:4 (P), Is 45:7, Job 26:10, Ec 2:13, cf. in imprecation Job 3:4, Job 3:5 ([[וחלמות]] ´[[ח]]) = [[לילה]] Ge 1:5, Ge 1:18 (P), cf. Jos 2:5 (JE), Is 45:19, Job 17:12, Job 24:16, Job 38:19, Ps 104:20; darkness in mines Job 28:3; of extraordinary darkness, in Egypt Ex 10:21, Ex 10:21 (E); [[־אֲפֵלָה]]´[[ח]] Ex 10:22 (E), Ps 105:28, from pillar of cloud Ex 14:20; at Mt. Sinai De 4:11, De 5:20; of clouds of theophany 2Sa 22:12 = Ps 18:12; of darkness in death, or She’ô l, 1Sa 2:9, Job 10:21 ([[וחלמות]] ´[[אֶרֶץ ח]]), Job 17:13, Job 18:18, Ps 88:13, Pr 20:20 (´[[אִישׁוֹן ח]] = extreme of darkness).
= secret place(s) Is 45:3, Job 12:22 (‖[[חלמות]]); = hiding-place Job 34:22 (‖ id.), cf. Ps 139:11, Ps 139:12; —on Ez Eze 8:12, v. supr.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: = dread, terror, symbol. of judgment Am 5:18, Am 5:20, Zep 1:15, Na 1:8, Ez Eze 32:8, Joe 2:4, Joe 3:4.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: = perplexity Job 5:14, Job 12:25, Job 19:8; confusion Ps 35:6.
